levels.description: Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{cost}</> DP. The Slumberfoot falls asleep and recovers <@ba.vup>{hp_recovery_per_sec_by_max_hp_ratio:0%}</> Max HP every second; Upon receiving damage, the Slumberfoot wakes up, gaining ATK <@ba.vup>+{blkngt_hypnos_s_1[rage].atk:0%}</> and ASPD <@ba.vup>+{blkngt_hypnos_s_1[rage].attack_speed:0%}</> for <@ba.vup>{blkngt_hypnos_s_1[rage].duration}</> seconds
